Player History
Drafted in 7th round, 124th overall pick, by Minnesota in 1970...
Traded from Minnesota to Detroit on 2/13/1970 (Going to MIN: LF T. Poquette. Going to DET: LF G. Hiser)...
Injured on 5/9/1976 with a Bruised Foot, out for 3 days...
